functions.name: game
examples:
(game "My Game" ; title
	(default-resolution: 640 480) ; resolution or window size
	(default-fullscreen: #f) ; fullscreen mode

	(dir-fonts: "font/" (engine-path: "assets/font/")) ; font directories
	(dir-levels: "logic/levels/") ; level directories
	(dir-rules: "logic/rules/") ; rule directories
	(dir-textures: "graphics/textures/") ; texture directories
	(dir-shaders: "graphics/shaders/" (engine-path: "assets/shaders/")) ; shader directories
	(dir-sounds: "audio/") ; sound directories
	(dir-layouts: "ui/" (engine-path: "assets/ui/")) ; layout directories
	(dir-entities: "logic/entities/") ; entity directories
	(dir-logs: "logs/") ; log directory
	(dir-tmp: "tmp/") ; tmp directory
)

options.name: default-fullscreen
options.description: Whether it should be run in fullscreen mode.

options.name: dir-fonts
options.description: The directories containing fonts. Use either paths or list of path components.

options.name: dir-levels
options.description: The directories containing levels. Use either paths or list of path components.

options.name: dir-rules
options.description: The directories containing rules. Use either paths or list of path components.

options.name: dir-textures
options.description: The directories containing textures. Use either paths or list of path components.

options.name: dir-shaders
options.description: The directories containing shaders. Use either paths or list of path components.

options.name: dir-sounds
options.description: The directories containing sounds. Use either paths or list of path components.

options.name: dir-layouts
options.description: The directories containing layouts. Use either paths or list of path components.

options.name: dir-entities
options.description: The directories containing entities. Use either paths or list of path components.

options.name: dir-logs
options.description: The directory to store the logs. Use either paths or list of path components.

options.name: dir-tmp
options.description: The directory to use for temporary storage. Use either paths or list of path components.

functions.name: library
functions.description: Creates a shader library with name.

functions.name: source
functions.description: Register a shader source with a library.

inputs.name: source-list
inputs.description: Holds the list of shader sources to be registered.

inputs.name: opengl
inputs.description: Indicates whether an OpenGL context is being used.

inputs.name: metal
inputs.description: Indicates whether a Metal context is being used.

inputs.name: vulkan
inputs.description: Indicates whether a Vulkan context is being used.

functions.name: asset
functions.description: Register assets with the engine. While asset registration can happen outside of this function, this is the standard mechanism to indicate asset registration.
